responses: Welcome to [Your Store]! How can I assist you today?
Thank you for visiting [Your Store]! Have a great day!
I'm just a bot, but thanks for asking. How can I help you today?
We offer a range of sustainable clothing made from eco-friendly materials. Browse our catalog to discover more!

patterns: How do I choose the right size?
responses: Our size guide can help you find the perfect fit. Check it out on our website or let me know the product, and I'll assist you!
You can easily track your order on our website. If you need assistance, feel free to provide your order number, and I'll check it for you.
Our return policy is designed to ensure your satisfaction. Please check our website for detailed information or let me know the specifics of your situation.
Yes, we currently have promotions on selected items. Check our 'Promotions' page on the website for more details.
Explore our latest arrivals featuring the newest trends in sustainable fashion. Visit our 'New Arrivals' section on the website.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
How can I pay for my order?
responses: We accept various payment methods, including credit cards, PayPal, and more. You can find the full list during the checkout process on our website.

patterns: How can I contact customer support?
responses: For assistance, you can reach our customer support team at support@[yourstore].com or call us at [customer support number]. We're here to help!
